bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.drawer

Interface DrawingLane

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener, SViewerSelectionListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AxisDrawingLane, BasicFeatureDrawingLane, DrawingLaneBase, RulerDrawingLane, SequenceDrawingLane

    public interface DrawingLane
extends SViewerSelectionListener
    This interface defines the methods describing a drawing lane.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

        objectSelected

    • Method Detail

      • getMaximumSize

        Dimension getMaximumSize()
        Returns the maximum size of the lane. Unit is pixel.

      • getMinimumSize

        Dimension getMinimumSize()
        Returns the minimum size of the lane. Unit is pixel.

      • getPreferredSize

        Dimension getPreferredSize()
        Returns the preferred size of the lane. Unit is pixel.

      • setPreferredSize

        void setPreferredSize(Dimension dim)
        Sets the preferred size of the lane. Unit is pixel.

      • setLeftMargin

        void setLeftMargin(int leftMargin)
        Sets the width of the left margin of this lane. Unit is pixel.

      • getLeftMargin

        int getLeftMargin()
        Returns the width of the left margin of this lane.

      • getLeftLabel

        String getLeftLabel()
        Returns the left label of this lane. This label is used to display the name of the lane on the left side of the viewer.

      • setRightMargin

        void setRightMargin(int rightMargin)
        Sets the width of the right margin of this lane. Unit is pixel.

      • getRightMargin

        int getRightMargin()
        Returns the width of the right margin of this lane.

      • getRightLabel

        String getRightLabel()
        Returns the right label of this lane. This label is used to display the name of the lane on the right side of the viewer.

      • setTopMargin

        void setTopMargin(int top)
        Sets the height of the top margin of this lane. Unit is pixel.

      • getTopMargin

        int getTopMargin()
        Returns the height of the top margin of this lane.

      • setBottomMargin

        void setBottomMargin(int bottom)
        Sets the height of the bottom margin of this lane. Unit is pixel.

      • getBottomMargin

        int getBottomMargin()
        Returns the height of the bottom margin of this lane.

      • getFont

        Font getFont()
        Returns the font used by the lane to display strings.

      • setFont

        void setFont(Font f)
        Sets the font to use by the lane to display strings.

      • computeScaleFactor

        double computeScaleFactor()
        Compute the scale factor. Basically this value should be computed by dividing the sequence size by the drawing panel width.

      • getSequence

        DSequence getSequence()
        Returns the sequence used as a reference for the drawing procedure.

      • getObjectFromSection

        Object getObjectFromSection(int xFrom,
                          int xTo)
        Find a drawing object given a mouse coordinate. This method should return null if no object is located at that position.

      • getClickedObject

        Object getClickedObject(int x)
        Find a drawing object given a x coordinate. This method should return null if no object is located at that position.

      • getRulerPositionAt

        int getRulerPositionAt(int x)
        Return an absolute ruler position given a x coordinate. Return value is in the range from 0 to DSequence.size()-1.

      • setReferenceLabelSize

        void setReferenceLabelSize(int size)
        Sets the size of a reference label. Unit is number of letters.

      • paintLane

        void paintLane(Graphics2D g,
             Rectangle drawingArea)
        Requires the lane to paint its content.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object
        drawingArea - the region that has to be used to draw

      • setDrawGrid

        void setDrawGrid(boolean b)
        Set whether or not the drawing lane has to display a grid.
